price: 12. Ogaada, hubaal, Waa iyaga kuwa wax bi’iska ahi ee wax halleeya, mase ay dareensana.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alā innahum humu al-muf'sidūna walākin lā yashʿurūna
